item.title: About Us
item.description: Hwa Nan Alumnae Inc. brief history Hwa Nan Alumnae Inc. was established in 1984 by Hwa Nan College graduates in USA. Our mission and vision (comes from corporation letter) Gordon: We are the alumnae of Fujian Hwa Nan Women’s College who learned English from native speakers so we could explore the world improving ourselves and helping those we meet along the way for the benefit of our global society.

item.title: Contact
item.description: We are here to help you! Please feel free to contact us using the Contact Form below or email us directly at hwananalumnaeinc@gmail.com.

item.title: International Faculty Recruitment FAQ
item.description: International Faculty Recruitment - Frequently Asked Questions 1. How do I get a visa to come to Hwa Nan to teach? The first step is to complete and send the application for teaching along with a resume and copies of diplomas to Hwa Nan Women’s College. You can do this by e-mail which you will find at the end of this website. To be able to teach at Hwa Nan Women’s College, you have to apply for a work visa (Z visa).

item.title: Our Unique College History
item.description: HWA NAN COLLEGE Hwa Nan was a college for women founded by the Women’s Foreign Missionary Society of the Methodist Episcopal Church. Its campus on Nantai Island, across the Min River from the city of Foochow, offered lovely views north and south. Hwa Nan evolved from a preparatory school into a four-year college, graduating its first class in 1921. The number of students remained small initially, numbering nine in the graduating class in 1925, and twelve graduates by 1928.
